original_text: When the Lord was about to take Elijah up to heaven in a whirlwind, Elijah and Elisha were on their way from Gilgal.
korean_text: 여호와께서 회오리 바람으로 엘리야를 하늘로 올리고자 하실 때에 엘리야가 엘리사와 더불어 길갈에서 나가더니

sentences.original_text: When the Lord was about to take Elijah up to heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 엘리야를 하늘로 데려가시려고 할 때

sentences.original_text: Elijah and Elisha were on their way
